definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

sentences.english: The point of our pacification operations was always described as "winning the hearts and minds" of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們綏靖行動的意義過去一貫被描寫爲“深得人心。”

sentences.english: The film about the death of a young child was one that really tugged at my heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 這部描寫一個小孩之死的電影真讓我揪心。

sentences.english: Look at the Hughes. This is line eighty of Samson.
sentences.chinese: 看到休斯版本描寫參孫的第80行。

sentences.english: I believe we should share our coverage according to the ratio of different views have in the society.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，應按照社會的世論風評的比例來描寫。

sentences.english: No life after death in the Bible either. Did you know that?
sentences.chinese: 沒有關於死後生活的描寫，你們知道嗎？

sentences.english: I found myself gasping over the tragedy of the poor people's lives that the play portrayed so well.
sentences.chinese: 我不由驚歎這部戲劇對於窮人苦難生活描寫入木三分。

sentences.english: The second chapter describes the phonology transfer system of Yunxian dialect.
sentences.chinese: 第二章描寫鄖縣方言的聲韻調系統。

sentences.english: Describe a time when a problem wast resolved to your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 描寫你對於疑難題目的措置懲罰不稱心的一次履歷。

sentences.english: Color description is frequently applied in LI He's Poems.
sentences.chinese: 李賀詩歌中，色彩描寫運用得相當頻繁。

sentences.english: Also, Rowling described the Luna-commentated match as "the last Quidditch match."
sentences.chinese: 而且羅琳會描寫盧娜解說“魁地奇的最後一戰”。

sentences.english: The book was padded out with uninteresting descriptions.
sentences.chinese: 這本書用些無趣的描寫拉得太長。

sentences.english: Describe the veins on the back of her hands.
Women are aways be delineate not as good as men.
sentences.chinese: 女人常常被描寫成不如男人。

sentences.english: In this novel, Galsworthy tells us the love tragedy between Ashurst and Megan.
sentences.chinese: 在這個中作者描寫了阿舍斯特和梅根的愛情悲劇。

sentences.english: One of the ads depicts a father teaching a son how to ride.
sentences.chinese: 在其中一個廣告裏，描寫的是父親教兒子騎車。

sentences.english: The novel portrays the growth of a fighter.
sentences.chinese: 這本小說描寫了一個戰士的成長。

definition: to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
